title: Selena Gomez praises ‘ride or die’ Taylor Swift after SKIMS drama
text:
Selena seemingly forgot about Taylor and Kim’s feud (Picture: Selena Gomez, Kim Kardashian, Instagram)

Selena Gomez landed herself in hot water after sharing a photo promoting Kim Kardashian’s SKIMS range – before deleting the snap and confirming her allegiance with Taylor Swift.

It all kicked off on Monday evening when Selena, 27, shared a selfie of herself modelling Kim’s shapewear in her bathroom mirror.

‘Legit so freaking comfortable,’ Selena captioned the image.

However, fans were shocked to see her support Kim’s new clothing venture in light of the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star’s nasty long-running feud with Taylor.

Following backlash from Taylor fans, Selena deleted the selfie from her Instagram Stories and replaced it with a selfie of her and Taylor hanging out together.

In a sweet message of support, the Hands To Myself singer wrote: ‘My ride or die. I would die for this one.

‘Thank you for forever being by my side. You have taught me so much, walked through all of this with me, STAYED and you remind me to be a better, human being. I’m on your side for life [sic].’

It comes after Taylor heaped nothing but praise and sweet words on Selena while discussing the popstar’s epic comeback with new single Lose You To Love Me in an interview with Apple Music Beats 1’s Zane Lowe.

‘It’s the best thing she’s ever done [her new music]… I’m so proud of her. She’s been through so much,’ Taylor said on the show.

‘I’ve watched so much happen in her life and had a front row seat to so much, and I’m so proud of her. She is such a revelation because now she’s making her best stuff. I am 100 percent convinced this is the best thing she’s done so far.’

Kim K appears to have sent Selena her SKIMS shapewear to promote (Picture: Kim Kardashian, Instagram)

Taylor continued: ‘The things that she’s overcome, the situations that she’s risen above. It’s been a long time that we’ve been friends, and she’s the best. She’s just the best. I’m really excited because when somebody has had great life experience, has had really tough things they’ve had to go through, and they can process that and make art that’s going to help other people, that’s what kind of song this is. I’m stoked.’

In her own interview with Zane, Selena was played an audio clip of Taylor’s kind sentiments and became emotional.

She explained: ‘[Taylor has been an] amazing [friend]. For sure. She was frustrated when I was frustrated. She was sad when I was sad.

‘But more than anything, my friends stood by my side. I think they visibly saw me in so much pain and they didn’t want it for me, but they never stopped loving me.

‘And I played her the song, and I played it with her mum and dad and I showed her the video and her mum and Taylor started crying.’
